module.name: ebay
module.description: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Easily export your products from PrestaShop to eBay, one of the world’s largest marketplaces, to win new customers and help accelerate your sales. Duplicate your online store to your eBay store, directly from your PrestaShop Back Office !
module.additional_description: Duplicate your PrestaShop online store to your eBay store, directly from your administration pannelDevelop a profitable sales channel using eBay as a new route to marketReach a global audience of over a hundred million potential buyersCreate listings and sell across both channels from 1 dashboardManage your orders across all channels and prevent over-selling

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.description: Find the best price for your shipment. Compare and order carriers offers at negotiated rates
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Find the best price for your shipment. Compare and order carriers offers at negotiated rates.

module.name: hipay
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. You can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: mailjet
module.description: Create and send transactional and marketing newsletters. Increase your merchant revenue with abandon cart and other triggered emails
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Create and send transactional and marketing newsletters. Increase your merchant revenue with abandon cart and other triggered emails. Analyze everything, including opens, clicks and how much revenue each newsletter generates, straight from within your PrestaShop account! This version of Mailjet’s add-on is compatible with only Mailjet v3 users. If you are a v1 user (any account created before April 2014), please request to get your account migrated via https://www.mailjet.com/support/ticket Discover our brand new user guide : https://www.mailjet.com/guides/prestashop-user-guide/
module.additional_description: With Mailjet, optimise your  deliverability,  get your emails delivered to the inbox and avoid the spam folder. Install the official Mailjet PrestaShop add-on and get access to:  ROI Stats:  Real-time sales and net revenue figures per marketing newsletter. Find out who opened, clicked, bounced or unsubscribed from your mailings, create graphs, export data and much more Setup triggered email events based on customer behavior (birthday promo, abandoned cart, survey request, …) Group and create specific customer segments  to send targeted  content to thus increasing engagement and  open rates Automatically remove unsubscribers from your contact lists and Newsletter list to keep your deliverability reputation intact Personalize your mailings with any contact list properties Create & manage all Mailjet campaigns and contacts directly within PrestaShop

module.name: ogone
module.description: Ingenico Payment Services* : Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely kn
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico Payment Services* : Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone
module.additional_description: There are many ways your business benefits from choosing Ingenico Payment Services as its payments partner : We process and secure internet payments. Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.name: paypal
module.description: Please your customers with one of the best payment solutions. With over 143 million active accounts worldwide, PayPal is a leader in payment solutions on web and mobile
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Please your customers with one of the best payment solutions. With over 143 million active accounts worldwide, PayPal is a leader in payment solutions on web and mobile. Available in 193 countries in 26 currencies, PayPal is also one of the most recognised and trusted online payment solutions by the customers

module.name: mondialrelay
module.description: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe. Mondial Relay shares his expertise with all merchants, regardless of their level of activity, proposing an offer without prerequisites of parcels quantity, without commitment period and no management fees or subscription.
module.additional_description: With this module, you will have a wider choice of delivery modes, your customers will appreciate the ability to be delivered by Point Relais® which you will improve your conversion rate.

module.name: tntcarrier
module.description: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with TNT. To read the description of this module, please select French language
module.author: Infostrates
module.description_full: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with TNT. To read the description of this module, please select French language.

module.name: trustedshops
module.description: Get better reviews with the Trustbadge®! Easily collect, show and manage real customer reviews. Integrate this module within minutes and display trust at first glance
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Get better reviews with the Trustbadge®! Easily collect, show and manage real customer reviews. Integrate this module within minutes and display trust at first glance.
module.additional_description: Genuine reviews from real people. Online shoppers can enter some personal data to give their reviews a social proof. Customers will trust you even more. Upload orders from previous customers and receive reviews within hours. Or collect reviews automatically with every purchase of your customers.

module.name: authorizeaim
module.description: Authorize.Net is a leading payment solution that makes accepting payments safe, easy and affordable. Over 400,000 merchants trust Authorize
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Authorize.Net is a leading payment solution that makes accepting payments safe, easy and affordable. Over 400,000 merchants trust Authorize.Net to manage their payment transactions securely and reliably.  Get Started Now- Open an Account Today﻿

module.name: cashondelivery
module.description: Accept cash on delivery payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept cash on delivery payments

module.name: ganalytics
module.description: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your customers go everywhere; shouldn't your analytics? Google Analytics shows you the full customer picture across ads and videos, websites and social tools, tablets and smartphones. That makes it easier to serve your current customers and win new ones.
module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: Shopping Feed is a feed management system, enables online stores to promote and sell their products on price comparison websites and marketplaces
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shopping Feed is a feed management system, enables online stores to promote and sell their products on price comparison websites and marketplaces.Enjoy 1-month free trial now !

module.description: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with UPS
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with UPS

module.description: Provides an automated method to upgrade your shop to the latest PrestaShop version
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Provides an automated method to upgrade your shop to the latest PrestaShop version
module.additional_description: Enjoy the benefits of version 1.6 of PrestaShop in one click with this module that allows you to update easily your online store!

module.name: socolissimo
module.description: Offer your customer 5 different delivery methods with LaPoste
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: Offer your customer 5 different delivery methods with LaPoste.
module.additional_description: You offer them and the ability to choose their home delivery mode (recovery mailbox or in person, with the possibility of delivery by appointment in the evening) or away from home (in Cityssimo space in the post office their choice or one of the local shops of our partner network).

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!

module.name: gadwords
module.categoryName: SEM/SEA - Paid search marketing and advertising
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer. Google and PrestaShop increase your advertising investment by offering £75 after the first spent £25  (or 75€ for 25€ if you are not based in the UK) !  Download the module to get your promotional code and start your campaign now !
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.  Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Or call 08001690713

module.name: paypalusa
module.description: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly.﻿

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) emails & SMS
module.author: SendinBlue
module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) emails & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with SendinBlue, easily create beautiful email campaigns and efficiently communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: shopgate
module.description: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugi
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugin. Integrating your shop takes a few hours with no investment!
module.additional_description: This is the fastest way for your customers to find what they seek. With Shopgate, your mobile visitors will become customers: fast loading, optimised for touch screens, clear navigation, optimal mobile payment methods, SEO and branch locator with GPS.

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.author: Touchdesign
module.description_full: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.additional_description: Attractive conditionsEasy integrationNo registration required for your customersAccustomed use of your customers’ familiar online banking detailsSecurity thanks to a multi-level online banking authentication procedureReal-time transaction confirmation

module.name: desjardins
module.description: An easy and effective way for PrestaShop users to create their online store at very competitive prices
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: An easy and effective way for PrestaShop users to create their online store at very competitive prices.

module.name: boxdropshipment
module.description: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office.﻿
module.additional_description: Stop loosing time with the shipment handling in your shop with boxdrop® eLogistics (transport and delivery)﻿.﻿ boxdrop® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office - adds a fully integrated shipment subsystem to your PrestaShop for free. Simply group your goods into parcels and generate shipment documents and a pickup request with a single click. To ensure a safe and fast delivery, all shipments are being handled by DHL, the world leader in logistic. No need for a lengthy sign-up process with sales representatives, simply create a boxdrop account and you are good to go.

module.name: payplug
module.description: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks.
module.additional_description: Our modern and intuitive solution allows you to improve your conversion rate with our functions and ergonomics specifically designed for e-commerce. Thanks to PayPlug, you can simplify your online payments and no longer lose out on sales:Quick payment without registrationModern and sleek designAutomatic detection of card type

module.name: pigmbhpaymill
module.description: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Easy multi-currency credit & debit card payments directly in your shop with no setup or monthly fees. Let your customers pay in a selection of payment methods to benefit from higher conversions.
module.additional_description: Integrating PAYMILL is a breeze, simply download the module to install and follow the steps  to sign up. Give your customers the flexibility of paying in a selection of payment methods, which includes all the major credit and debit cards   Your Payments Secured With our Level-1 PCI Compliance we’ve got you covered with the highest security and data protection standards. Making it even faster for you to start accepting online payments.   Accept Payments Worldwide Reach a global market by accepting payments from around the world and in up to 100 different currencies.   One-Click Checkout Save your customer’s time by letting them store their payment information securely on our servers for future purchases. All they need to do is click to buy!

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue. The claim is resolved in a couple of clicks, time is saved and customer’s loyalty increased.
module.additional_description: Youstice is a new-generation multilingual online tool, delivering fast and fair solutions to customer complaints all over the world. It helps companies seamlessly communicate and handle claims - both within countries and cross-border.   Through Youstice, in just a couple of clicks, both sides can communicate and negotiate directly, getting issues resolved within minutes. The process is standardized, automated and sophisticated, as it provides options for a constructive dialogue between the consumer and retailer. If no agreement can be reached, Youstice offers the option to have the complaint reviewed by a neutral third-party professional, by mutual agreement, for a quick and fair decision.   By resolving complaints rapidly and fairly retailers become trusted sellers, gain loyal customers, prevent negative feedback and make clients more engaged.   Watch our video and visit our website for more information.   BenefitsConnect with your customers and increase their loyalty – thanks to a personalized approach to customer complaintsYou save time- solving a complaint takes just a couple of clicksYou minimize negative reviews and prevent customers from posting future ones by resolving their complaints quickly and efficientlyYou get help with international expansion – you will get an access to our ecosystem of interconnected online markets, consumer organizations, trustmarks and ODR (Online Dispute Resolution) providers

module.name: klikandpay
module.description: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone. Partners with many Banks and International acquirers, Klik & Pay assists its merchants for 15 years, in France, Europe and all over the World. Whatever your industry, we have a solution for you:
module.additional_description: No start-up fees or monthly subscriptionOnly 1.45% and 0.3 € per transactionA team available to help you secure your transactions and increase your conversion rate.

module.name: erpillicopresta
module.description: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Save time on e-shop management with the 1st free and adaptable ERP: Client orders, Shipping, Suppliers, Stock management and export, Inventory, and more.
module.additional_description: When it comes to added professionalism for the management of your client and supplier orders, advanced configuration of your supplier forms, or even managing and exporting your stock and running your inventory, the 1-Click ERP pack will be your preferred assistant to help you manage your store in a simple, efficient way! Managing your back-office will no longer be a problem! The 1-Click ERP pack will save you precious time in managing your e-commerce: Up to 2h per day, according to the merchants who use it!

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is a global payment gateway and so much more.  We offer the widest global support in the industry plus 110 different payment types including all of Tier 1 credit cards, diner cards, PayPal, E-checks and wire transfers. PrestaShop and BlueSnap help shoppers make purchases easily and securely with the free BlueSnap module.
module.additional_description: Sell globally with no developmentEasy all-in-one global payment module supportingVISA, MasterCard, Amex, Discover, JCB, Diners Club, Carte BleuePaypal, Alipay, Ukash, Skrill, and more+ 110 of the most preferred alternative payment methods worldwideDon’t install more than one module for paymentsReduce cart abandonment with localized checkout pagesModule automatically renders checkout page in shopper’s local language, local currency, and preferred local payment typeMore transactions approved because of our intelligent payment routing technologyCompetitive pricing starting at 2.9% + 30C per approved transactionCheckout page optimized for mobile and desktop

module.name: loyaltylion
module.description: Add a loyalty program to your store in minutes. Show customers they’re valued and increase sales by rewarding referrals, purchases, signups, reviews and visits
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Add a loyalty program to your store in minutes. Show customers they’re valued and increase sales by rewarding referrals, purchases, signups, reviews and visits. You decide what to reward and how to reward it for example, 100 points for signups, 5 points per $1 spent and 1000 points per referral. Customers collect points and redeem them for vouchers to spend at your store. Gain customer insights like biggest refers and top spenders. Customise the design and text to match your store.
module.additional_description: Increase basket size on average 9.4%Increase sales via repeat purchasesAcquire new customers using our refer a friend featureIncrease customer happinessDifferentiate your store from your competitorsReach 1000s on social networks - read case study of a store who reached more than 10,000 people in 3 months. Why us?  LoyaltyLion is trusted by hundreds of ecommerce stores around the world. From small andmedium sized stores to the largest in Europe.

module.name: sellstrom
module.description: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs. Our module simplifies your shipping process by automatically creating your shipping labels.  Your customers choose the desired carrier and service from our multicarrier platform -- USPS, UPS, FedEx and DHL services.  Once your customer completes their order, the shipping label is automatically created and available for you to print within the order section of your PrestaShop Store.  Completely automated and hassle free!!!
module.additional_description: Your customers choose from 4 carriers – USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL.Full USPS service selectionSave time and reduce errors.  The shipping label is auto created from the customer orderDomestic or international shipmentsRate customizationTry the SGS Module for the 1st month for free.  The module is $9.95 per month

module.name: nostotagging
module.description: Nosto is the easiest way to deliver your customers personalized shopping experiences - wherever they are
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nosto is the easiest way to deliver your customers personalized shopping experiences - wherever they are. ​GO LIVE TODAY WITH 14 DAYS FREE – NO CREDIT CARD REQUIRED!
module.additional_description: Increase Online Sales and enable customers to Enjoy Online Shopping!Increase Average Order Value with Cross- and Up-sell recommendationsBoost Conversion Rate & Increase Retention with personalized recommendationsLearn more about your customers through a real-time dashboard viewPay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yours
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 2 months trial
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SBM Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start, - it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: brinkscheckout
module.description: Brink’s Checkout, a service provided by The Brink’s Company, allows merchants from 200 countries to accept online payments from customers worldwide in multiple currencies and languages in
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Brink’s Checkout, a service provided by The Brink’s Company, allows merchants from 200 countries to accept online payments from customers worldwide in multiple currencies and languages in addition to the most widely used payment methods (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Diners, Discover, JCB, PayPal, and Debit Card). In addition, it comes with a no-cost state-of-the-art fraud prevention. Merchants access all of that with a simple, low-cost, per performance pricing.
module.additional_description: The all-in-one of paymentsGet all you need to start accepting payments now: payment gateway and processor, merchant account, fraud prevention and free module.Trust all the wayOur transparent checkout combined with our brand gives customers the feeling of trust, safety and certainty. This way they know they are in your website and a secure area, where they can complete their purchase.Maximize conversionThe seamless payment experience provides users several different payment options including the ability to pay in several different currencies and languages.Maximize salesWith Brink’s Checkout, sell in over 200 countries, using 26 different currencies in 15 different languages.Minimize fraud and have peace-of-mindBrink’s Checkout is the only Checkout platform with over 15 years of experience selling internationally. The patented technology and 300 variables gives merchants the confidence to sell globally in the most convenient and reliable way. Additionally, our fraud specialists review each and every transaction to ensure you have the peace of mind you need to carry on with your business.

module.name: dotpay
module.description: Dotpay enables fast and handy Internet payments accepting for sellers in e-shop based on PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Dotpay enables fast and handy Internet payments accepting for sellers in e-shop based on PrestaShop. Start your account and see how much you may earn accepting payments online via Dotpay!
module.additional_description: Cooperation between Dotpay and PrestaShop is an answer for sellers needs who minimalizing efforts want to increase their selling opportunities. The possibilities offered by PrestaShop are not limited only to basic Internet shop functions. They offer many more - versatile offer of developing an offer, sales analyses, banner systems applying and comments, RSS channels or goods comparison. A useful functionality is individual creation of graphics changing this way the e-shop looks. What is more, the program may be developed by external modules.

module.name: sarbacanedesktop
module.description: Go to the module to start your campaign and benefit from 500 free credits ! Easily create and send stunning newsletters to inform your community and increase customer loyalty
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Go to the module to start your campaign and benefit from 500 free credits ! Easily create and send stunning newsletters to inform your community and increase customer loyalty. The module synchronizes your PrestaShop store and your Sarbacane Desktop emailing software.
module.additional_description: Support:  multilingual technical support available to help you - phone and emailmany online resourcesvideos, tutorials, guides, tips ...  Easy: Simply create beautiful responsive newsletters thanks to the EmailBuilderOptimal deliverability: Your customers really receive your emailsAdvanced Features: targeting, segmentation, Split test...

module.name: prestashippingeasy
module.description: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections. Quickly fulfill orders placed on your website and marketplaces, including eBay, Amazon, Sears, Newegg and more. An easy to use system backed by exceptional service from shipping specialists. And, the best USPS rates - up to 46% off. FREE starter plan for up to 50 packages a month.
module.additional_description: Prestashop + ShippingEasy = the right combination for easy, fast, shipping with built-in savings  Sync all your orders in one locationSave up to 46% with the best USPS ratesEasy carrier integration with USPS, UPS and FedExFREE starter plan for up to 50 shipments per monthExceptional customer support Prestashop syncs automatically with ShippingEasy, downloading in all your order details in minutes and helping you assign shipping preferences, rates and delivery options in real-time. No cut and paste. No manual update. Save up to 46% Finally, access to competitive USPS rates – in fact, the cheapest around. For example: USPS Priority Mail: Medium Flat Rate box: retail $12.35, our price: $10.65 – a savings of $1.70 on a single shipment. Built in savings! All part of the service.

module.name: reforestaction
module.description: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop.
module.additional_description: With the module Responsible Purchase by Reforest' Action, your customers can plant a tree in the world to compensate the CO2 emissions of their purchase. Thanks to you, they act for the planet and they let it know on Facebook and Twitter. So you get better visibility on the Internet, free of charge.

module.name: expressmailing
module.description: First Marketing & Newsletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 9,000 free emails per month i.e
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: First Marketing & Newsletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 9,000 free emails per month i.e. 300 per day, and the possibility to send FAX and SMS at very low prices.
module.additional_description: With more than 13 years of experience in direct marketing, we provide the ideal tool to broadcast your marketing campaigns (emailing, faxing & Sms). Fully integrated with PrestaShop Express-Mailing module allows you to precisely select recipients of the campaigns from your PrestaShop customers or visitors by using various filters. You can easily send them newsletters, discounts or special offers, report your season sales or announce your corporate events. Quick and intuitive, you can send your email campaigns to 200 or even 10 000 contacts in less than 5 minutes. Experience the Express-Mailing module now, and boost your sales !

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop. Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions.
module.additional_description: -       Easy set-up, plug & play -       Responsive design -       All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home@bpostParcels lockerInternational-       Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module -       Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) -       Print directly from the backend -       Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.name: ovhhosting
module.description: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7.

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders. Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: mercadopagobr
module.description: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment. MercadoPago provide the highest security standard with PCI Level 1 certification and an internal robust fraud analysis. With MercadoPago, you can accept major credit card brands, offer installments options and receive all funds upfront, and allow consumers to pay in websites or mobiles. Credit Card Customized Checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized checkout for credit card payment. Thus, it will be possible to customize its look and feel, customers won’t be redirected away to complete the payment, and it will also reduce the checkout steps improving conversion rate. Customized Bar Code Payment: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized bar code payment. It reduces the checkout steps improving conversion rates. The bar code payment can be also customized with the merchant's logo. Standard checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a standard checkout. It includes all payment methods (i.e. all credit cards, bar code payment, account money) and all window types (i.e. redirect, iframe and modal). Customization is not possible for this type of checkout. Sign up here!
module.additional_description: MercadoPago can help Prestashop’s merchants increase their sales with its cutting edge payment technology, providing solutions that fit with the clients’ needs:  - Online and real-time payment processing- High approval rate through an internal robust fraud analyses - High conversion with our customized checkout- Customizable bar code payment - Potential new consumers due to our large user base – 120 million in Latin America- Highest Level 1 PCI certification- Major credit card brands acceptance- Payment in installments- Two-day or fourteen day funding*- Omni-channel payment system for website and mobiles- One-click to pay with MercadoPago’s standard checkout- Sellers protection program*- Easy to install module  * According to MercadoPago’s terms and conditions.

module.name: chronopost
module.description: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.additional_description: Choose the carrier that delivers more than 80 million packages per year and serves 230 countries.Save time with simplified managementGet real-time tracking of your shipments

module.name: dpdgroup
module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface.
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user gains access to functionalities which make shipment management easy. This solution will help optimize and automatize the shop’s performance when it comes to handling and sending parcels, including:  printing of waybills (label, delivery of goods protocol)ordering courierstracking your parcelsviewing shipment history

module.name: nimblepayment
module.description: Nimble Payments is an online payment gateway supported by BBVA that enables you to accept online payments flexibly and safely
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nimble Payments is an online payment gateway supported by BBVA that enables you to accept online payments flexibly and safely. With services to help you manage your business: qualified customer care service in Spanish and soon customized funding.

module.name: protectedshops
module.description: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy po
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy policy and many more. Automatic update.  2 months for free for PrestaShop users!
module.additional_description: Individual legal texts through questionnaires creation The survey considers the characteristics of the different countries, payment procedures, logistic providers, tracking solutions, social networks and can easily generate the legal texts for nearly every individual business model legally correct.   Automatic update when new laws or court decisions become effective The maintenance happens independently from the online traders. The module synchronizes the legal texts regularly with the servers of Protected Shops and cares for the actuality of the legal texts. The trader can decide which documents he wants to use and the frequency of the updating can be determined by the customer himself. The update is necessary when new laws or court decisions become effective, so that the online shop is always up to date. At that point, online traders are protected against legal proceedings.

module.name: shiptomyid
module.description: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver.  A PrestaShop store will increase consumer’s ability to send gifts up to 98%, and speed up mobile checkout by 75x.

module.name: liveperson
module.description: LiveEngage is the modern way to connect with your online shoppers.  Increase sales conversions and overall satisfaction
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: LiveEngage is the modern way to connect with your online shoppers.  Increase sales conversions and overall satisfaction. The single user, free plan is totally free for one user, who can take unlimited chats with as many people at a time. Plus, we aren’t limiting any features, so you get full access to all of LiveEngage.
module.additional_description: LivePerson LiveEngage is the modern way to talk to visitors on your online store and on their mobile devices.  Stores that connect with their customers in real-time see an increase in conversions and overall satisfaction.

module.name: mobfirst
module.displayName: MobFirst - Native Mobile Apps to your PrestaShop
module.description: Best mobile solution for your store. The most complete iPhone and Android apps published for Prestashop. Automatically integrated by the click of a button
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Best mobile solution for your store. The most complete iPhone and Android apps published for Prestashop. Automatically integrated by the click of a button. We built beautiful, easy-to-use, mobile commerce apps for your PrestaShop store.
module.additional_description: Always with your client: Being constantly in touch with your customers through mobile apps has become increasingly common for companies who want to build customer loyalty.With you apps, customers can be directly activated at any time through PUSH notifications. Tell them about your new products, promos and campaigns. Make them loyal customers. Higher Conversion Rates: Apps have an average 40% greater conversion rate compared to responsive websites. Don’t miss any sales, use your full revenue potential. Branding: Having an app is more than just sales, it’s a statement of your commitment, quality and care for all of your customers. The largest ecommerces already know it, and now it’s your chance of having an exclusive app for your store. Fast support: 100% of our customers get an answer within 24 hours (workdays) to help you as quickly as possible get your apps published. Pricing: For only $149/month you will have your own app, customized according to your visual identity and fully integrated with you PrestaShop store.

module.name: stickngo
module.description: The StickN’Go sheets allow you to have in a unique document your order form and your delivery label! Simple, 2 in 1, without any configuration, neither module addition, the StickN’Go sheet
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The StickN’Go sheets allow you to have in a unique document your order form and your delivery label! Simple, 2 in 1, without any configuration, neither module addition, the StickN’Go sheets have been developed together with PrestaShop teams Your client's delivery address is perfectly printed on a removable label . No operations is required to use the StickN’Go sheets. TRY StickN'Go NOW, RECEIVE YOUR PACK ( Free delivery)

module.name: securitypatch
module.description: This module solves a security issue for PrestaShop 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6. Install this module, and it will apply the security patch that was released in late July 2015
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module solves a security issue for PrestaShop 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6. Install this module, and it will apply the security patch that was released in late July 2015. You can learn more about the issue by reading the security announcement.

module.name: openpayprestashop
module.description: Openpay is the best payment gateway in México
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Openpay is the best payment gateway in México. Accept multiple payments methods instantly like: credit/debit cards, cash payments in over 12,00 convenience stores and wire transfer (SPEI), everything with payments  notifications in real time.
module.additional_description: This module allows you to accept 3 different payment methods directly on your site through your Openpay account. Users select payment method during the checkout process and never leave your site, resulting in a better experience for the user, and more successful conversions for you.

module.name: mediafinanz
module.description: Your customer is not paying? This free-of-charge mediafinanz module will enable you to transfer outstanding claims from your order overview to the collection experts for further processing
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: Your customer is not paying? This free-of-charge mediafinanz module will enable you to transfer outstanding claims from your order overview to the collection experts for further processing. You will manage and control your claims from your back office.
module.additional_description: YOUR ADVANTAGES A free-of-charge collection module for your PrestaShopMore resources for your core businessHigher realisation rates by means of long-term experience in online collectionMaintenance of your long-term customer relationsOutstanding IT and data securityProfessional, personal adviceStaff with sound legal experience The outsourcing of the extra-judicial collection of your outstanding claims will save your time and valuable internal resources. Our processes are fully automated and based on state of the art software technology with high data security. The TÜV-certified collection solution, which does not involve any cost risk, can be optimally integrated into your existing shop work flow. mediafinanz does not just think of itself as a collection agent for you, but as your active companion. Our approach is designed to achieve settlement by agreement. We strive to find solutions acceptable to both parties, to ensure existing customer relations are not prejudiced, and to collect receivables at an early stage of the collection management. NO COST RISKMembership not requiredNo basic subscriptionNo lump sum payment on non-collectable itemsNo success based fees Button to the registration module Register now free-of-charge! More than 25,000 clients rely on us. Why not experience a new kind of freedom as well!

module.name: creditfr
module.description: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.additional_description: Borrow directly from individuals at competitive rates Thanks to a new type of financing without any bank ! Enjoy a quick and easy credit, seamlessly You make an online request to immediately know your eligibility to our financing offer. You get a response within 48 hours. You know exactly how many fees you will pay and you can follow your transaction 100% online via your customer space on Credit.fr Finance all your development projects With Credit.fr, you can finance different kind of projects:Any type of material (Computer Telephony, Medical Office, Medical,)Machine & ToolIntangible / WebsiteTourism / Utility / Industrial VehicleWorks / Facilities / Real EstateBusiness Takeover (the target must be over 4 years)Franchise / Admission Feed (franchisor of over 4 years)Research & DevelopmentBuyout of Partners Current Accounts

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: convermax
module.description: Our flagship product, Convermax, is an enhanced Site Search product that delivers the right results fast
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Our flagship product, Convermax, is an enhanced Site Search product that delivers the right results fast. Its intuitive and easy to use interface lets customers use multi-dimensional search to find what they need.
module.additional_description: Shoppers have been "Google-ized" and expect relevant results fast. Online shopping should be fun and easy, and with Convermax, they get the relevant results quickly. The entire experience is designed to help increase sales conversions.

module.name: checkyourdata
module.displayName: Accurate Google Analytics Reports by Check Your Data
module.description: Discover the real return on your marketing investments: collect 100% of your sales data in Google Analytics to get the most of your reports with clean, accurate and reliable data
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Discover the real return on your marketing investments: collect 100% of your sales data in Google Analytics to get the most of your reports with clean, accurate and reliable data.
module.additional_description: Check Your Data optimizes your data before sending them to Google Analytics: you now get the data from all sales made on your ecommerce website. You are therefore able to focus on the ROI of your marketing actions.    The module handles errors due to:  Non-return customer to the shop after payment on an external websitepayments by ckeck or bank transfersMultiple calls to the confirmation page for the same transactionOr errors due to misconfigured payment modules   Check Your Data takes into account cancellation orders, partial and full refunds. We push these data directly into your ecommerce analytics reports.   Thanks to all these optimizations you are able to make decisions with reliable KPIs and measure the true ROI of your webmarketing actions.

module.name: remarkety
module.description: Remarkety will help you grow sales by over 30% sending personalized and targeted emails based on customer behavior and purchase history
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Remarkety will help you grow sales by over 30% sending personalized and targeted emails based on customer behavior and purchase history.
module.additional_description: Deliver Product Recommendations Automatically suggest products your customers might like in emails to cross-sell and up-sell Send Personalized Coupons Send personalized coupon codes to your customers to increase purchase rate Win Back Inactive Customers Deliver emails that urge sleeping customers to visit your website and purchase Recover Abandoned Carts Automatically email customers with images, links and prices of products they left in their cart Nurture Leads Automatically deliver emails to prospects and leads after they sign up for your newsletter Targeted Email Blasts & Newsletters Segment by customer behavior and purchases to send relevant and personalized emails Beautiful Reporting Dashboard Intuitive dashboard displays essential analytics including purchase rate on every campaign HTML Template Editor Use pre-made templates or design your own with the template editor Proactive Feedback & Marketing Ideas Recieve weekly tuning adjustments to improve email campaign performance

module.name: alipay
module.displayName: Alipay Official - the leading ePayment solution for China
module.description: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions. It is a secure and convenient solution and preferred by over 400 million active members.
module.additional_description: What is Alipay? Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading third-party online payment solution for China. The significantly growing interest by Chinese shoppers in Western brands create large opportunities for Western companies with 67% of Chinese luxury spending occurring outside Chinese borders. If you are offering maternity products, food supplements, fashion, beauty or jewellery, Alipay will create an astonishing opportunity for you, opening up the Chinese market.
